title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$y$$, we can add $$5x$$ to both sides of the equation, which gives us $$y=-1+5x$$.
speech: To isolate  y , we can add  5 x  to both sides of the equation, which gives us  y is equal to, negative 1 plus 5 x .
pacedSpeech: to both sides of the equation, which gives us   y is equal to, negative 1 plus 5 x
